instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add '@fontsource/manrope' and '@fontsource/ibm-plex-sans' to package.json and import in index.js.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the colors and font families defined in this JSON.
3. OVERRIDE CSS VARIABLES: Update index.css :root variables to match the 'colors.light' palette exactly.
4. COMPONENT CUSTOMIZATION: When using Shadcn components, apply the 'components' styles defined here via className overrides or by modifying the component source directly if needed.
5. DASHBOARD LAYOUT: Use the 'Control Room' grid strategy for the admin dashboard. Dense, data-rich, minimal whitespace between cards.
6. SIGNING PAGE: Use a 'Focus Mode' layout. Center the document viewer. Remove unnecessary navigation. Use the 'legal_paper' shadow for the document container.
7. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid attributes to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards) using kebab-case (e.g., 'login-submit-btn', 'contract-card-1').
8. LOGO: Use the text 'JOTUNS' in Manrope Bold if the image logo is not available, styled with the primary blue color.
9. LEGAL COMPLIANCE: Ensure the 'Audit Log' and 'Integrity Check' features are prominent in the UI, using the 'security_tech' image as a subtle background or header for these sections.

universal_guidelines.design_philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.
universal_guidelines.spacing: Generous spacing (p-8, p-12) for marketing. Dense spacing (p-4) for dashboards.
component_rules: Use Shadcn for logic, custom Tailwind for layout.
universal_guidelines.testing: All interactive elements MUST have data-testid attributes.
